'''Radiant Spincrystal 111''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Crystalline Path]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of some crates at the rear of the '''Abandoned Production Facility''' in the [[Fortress of Meropide]]. Obtaining it requires progress into the {{Quest|Unfinished Comedy}}.
